item.title: Install Windows Update From Powershell
item.author: sapus
item.description: This guide will show how to install Windows updates from Powershell. Make sure the Execution Policies are allowed with this command 1 Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser Or 1 Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Force The Get-WindowsUpdate command is not a native PowerShell command, but rather it is part of a PowerShell module called “PSWindowsUpdate”. This module provides cmdlets that allow you to manage Windows updates from the PowerShell command line.
